original_title: Voices from the Frontline: China's War on Poverty
overview: The inside story of China's race to eradicate all extreme poverty by the end of the year 2020. With unprecedented access, filmmakers embed in China's poverty alleviation campaign-revealing tens of millions of poor families with customized plans, and the millions of officials recruited and held accountable for the success of the program.
title: Voices from the Frontline: China's War on Poverty
